page.title: 09 RED HOUSE FARM ESTATE
page.content: Is an example of a modern housing estate.It is situated on the N.W. boundary of WHITLEY BAY,backing onto a green belt of arable farm land.It is a 1980's estate of about 400 mixed, private houses consisting of 3 or 4 bedroomed detached houses,1 or 2 bedroomed terraced houses and 2 or 3 bedroomed bungalows.Prices range from 30-90,000 pounds.Styles range from large mock Tudor to small bungalows and open plan designs.Most are timber framed with red brick and pantile roofing.All have at least 1 garage and open plan gardens.There are future plans for shops and a public house. There is one postbox and no telephone box.A bus service runs from the edge of the estate linking it to Whitley Bay and Newcastle via the local Metro system (a bus/rail network).
